thread.title: Great for business travellers & love the 24 hours club living room
thread.title_full: Great for business travellers & love the 24 hours club living room - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Grand Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Eltan16
title: Great for business travellers & love the 24 hours club living room
text:
Stayed there for 2 nights and it's a great hotel for business travellers. Taxi from JFK to hotel is about US$60 and if you are on a budget you can take the NYC Airporter (shutter bus $18 per way) located few streets from this hotel. Grand Central station is a block away..
Right across the hotel, you can find deli, Asian food and many other choices around within short distance.
Room is clean, lift is spacious and 24 hours access to the club living room that offers free coffee, tea, fruits & snacks. They even provide bottles by the coolers where you can fill water. Really neat idea!
